[h2]À la une[/h2] [list] [*]Ajout d’un fond de menu principal sur le thème de **SynTek Résidentiel**. [*]Les flux de caméras affichés derrière le briefing contiennent désormais moins de parasites et sont moins distrayants. [*]De nombreuses armes sont désormais plus précises en position accroupie. [/list]
[h2]Weapons[/h2] [i]Weapon recoil has been changed on several guns. A coding error was previously causing "flattened" recoil to work differently when aiming north or south versus east or west.[/i] [list] [*][b]22A3-1 Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° (wide) × 03° (tall) → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A4-2 Combat Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A5 Heavy Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 06° × 03° → 06° × 01°. [*][b]22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]50CMG4-1:[/b] Normal spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 20° × 10°. Crouch spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 10° × 05°. [*][b]IAF Medical SMG:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]IAF Minigun:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]K80 Personal Defense Weapon:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]M42 Vindicator:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]Model 35 Pump-action Shotgun:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]PS50 Bulldog:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]S23A SynTek Autogun:[/b] Normal spread: 07° × 07° → 07° × 03°. Crouch spread: 07° × 07° → 04° × 01°. [/list]
[h2]Améliorations des missions[/h2] [list] [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Made the ceiling of the elevator slightly transparent to help with camera rotation. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Fixed some flickering on the exit door of the elevator. [*][b]Jacob's Rest : Deima Surface Bridge :[/b] Correction de certains points d’apparition de drones sur le pont qui pouvaient bloquer des aliens. [*][b]Jacob's Rest : Deima Surface Bridge :[/b] Amélioration des apparitions d’ennemis de type Onslaught à la fin du pont. [*][b]Research 7: Illyn Forest:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. Improved alien navigation around first biomass. Fixed marines may get stuck there as well. [*][b]Research 7: Jericho Mines:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor : Tunnels d’entretien abandonnés :[/b] Correction d’aliens bloqués près du laser. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor : Spatioport de la colonie Oasis :[/b] Correction d’un point d’apparition de xénomite dans la salle de contrôle qui ne fonctionnait pas. Fixed harvester moving to unreachable area near map end. [*][b]Tilarus-5 : Infiltration arctique :[/b] Correction de collisions trompeuses près du premier sas. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Communication Center:[/b] Fixed some rare crashes and improved visals. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Maintenance:[/b] Fixed there sometimes not being enough hackable panels to fix the bridge. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Bridge:[/b] Minor performance improvements. Improved visuals of out-of-bounds cannon. [*][b]Paranoia: Hostile Places:[/b] Minor visual improvements. [*][b]Paranoia : Haute tension :[/b] Correction de certains cas de scintillement du sol. [*][b]Paranoia: Crucial Point:[/b] Reduced terrain complexity that did not affect gameplay or visuals for slightly faster load time. [*][b]Nam Humanum : Plateforme XVII :[/b] Correction d’aliens d’Onslaught apparaissant en plein air le long de la voie de la plateforme. [*][b]Nam Humanum : Laboratoires Groundwork :[/b] Correction de marines supplémentaires (au-delà des huit premiers, dans les modes spéciaux) bloqués au démarrage. [*][b]Nam Humanum : Laboratoires Groundwork :[/b] Correction d’un ralentissement de performance en approchant de la zone centrale en multijoueur. [*][b]Reduction : Cité en ruine :[/b] Correction d’un feu près de certains œufs à la fin de la mission, qui mettait trop de temps à s’enflammer. [*][b]DM Desert:[/b] Fixed obstacles being tinted dark blue. [*][b]Reduced networking traffic by optimizing prop_ragdoll on the following maps:[/b][list][*]Jacob's Rest: Landing Bay[*]Jacob's Rest: SynTek Residental[*]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII[*]Paranoia: Close Contact[*]Paranoia: Crucial Point[*]Research 7: Jericho Mines[*]Tears for Tarnor: Insertion Point[*]Tilarus-5: Arctic Infiltration[*]Tilarus-5: Syntek Hospital[/list] [/list]
